DOC.brief_summary: Axitinib dose titration ( give high dose drug standard start dose ) among certain patient may improve response treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Axitinib ( AG-013736 ) With Or Without Dose Titration ( Increase ) In Patients With Kidney Cancer
DOC.criteria: metastatic renal cell carcinoma ( kidney cancer ) clear cell component prior systemic therapy ( include prior adjuvant neoadjuvant ) Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group ( ECOG ) Performance Status 01 Blood Pressure < = 140/90mmHg brain/CNS metastasis use 2 blood pressure medication
DOC.keyword: axitinib AG-013736 dose titration ( increase ) renal cell carcinoma
